name: pixiv-mcp-server
description: A powerful Pixiv toolset for Large Language Models via MCP
long_description: A comprehensive Pixiv integration that provides browsing, searching, and downloading capabilities for Pixiv content through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). Features include multi-dimensional search, intelligent downloading with automatic file organization, community content browsing, and secure OAuth 2.0 authentication.

tools.name: set_download_path
tools.description: Set the default local save location for images and animations

tools.name: download
tools.description: Download one or more artworks by ID with intelligent storage rules

tools.name: refresh_token
tools.description: Manually refresh Pixiv API token when encountering authentication errors

tools.name: set_refresh_token
tools.description: Set or update the Pixiv refresh token for authentication. This allows configuring the token after DXT installation.

tools.name: search_illust

tools.name: illust_ranking

pixiv_refresh_token.description: Your Pixiv OAuth refresh token for API authentication. Use get_token.py to obtain this.
